examples: She likes to walk around in bare feet.
They wore shabby clothes and their feet were bare.
Vestían ropas raídas y estaban descalzos.
His bare legs were covered in wiry golden hairs.
Sus piernas desnudas estaban cubiertas de nervudos cabellos dorados.
The winter sun filtered through the bare branches of the trees.
El sol de invierno se filtraba a través de las ramas desnudas de los árboles.
